attributes.action: create a national bank holiday on which we all wheel our sofas out on to the street
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To celebrate and strengthen the spirit of community there should be one day a year on which roads are closed and people are encouraged to wheel out their sofas onto the street, where they can sit and enjoy the company of their neighbours.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
